title: Date to submit documents?
content: Will the dates be extended from 25th july again?

comments.body: They have been, now it's 5 Aug
Where do you guys get these news from? And what if someone fails to submit documents before the given time,like only about a few of my documents are to be submitted.

https://pes.edu/important-dates/
Keep checking this link.
I have no idea what happens if you don't submit the docs. Seniors told they were allowed to submit even after classes began, don't know about this year though.
